# Pull Request Template

Use this template for new pull requests. It ensures PRs include a clear
description, related issue references, and testing notes.

- Description: Brief summary of the change and rationale.
- Related issue: Reference the issue number if applicable (e.g.,
  `Closes #123`).
- Type of change: (e.g., bugfix, feature, docs, refactor)
- Checklist: add any required checklist items (tests added, docs updated,
  etc.).
